messageAboutMe1: I'm a full stack software engineer with 15 years of experience. My speciality is JavaScript: React, Node.
messageAboutMe2: I'm going to prove you that in a long run quality code costs less.
messageTDD: Simply put: maintainable code is impossible without tests. Robust tests are possible only with Test-first approach.
messageQuality: Neatly planned distribution of UI into multi-layered components structure. As if lego bricks, small single purpose components are packaged into a Bit.dev collection and showcased with Storybook. Larger components consume these bricks and once combined result in a robust and functional UI.
messagePerformance: Without question React is fast. Yet surrounding ecosystem has plenty of performance traps. I structure the code in a way that computation is done only when underlying data does change.
messageLean: I'm an adept of Lean and Agile. Let's work in sprints and make sure deliverable get you the knowledge required to plan for the next step.
